HelpXML.Title: TBeff
HelpXML.Purpose: Tbeff finds the constant c which is associated to the requested efficiency for Tukey's biweight

Item.Name: eff
Item.LongDesc: Scalar which contains the required efficiency (of location or scale estimator).

Item.Name: shapeeff
Item.LongDesc: If 1, the efficiency is referred to shape else (default) is referred to location

Item.Name: approxsheff
Item.LongDesc: If 1, when p > 1 the approximate formula for scale efficiency is used else (default) the exact formula of the variance of the robust estimator of the scale is used

Item.Name: ceff
Item.LongDesc: Tuning constatnt of Tukey Biweigh rho function associated to requested value of efficiency

References.Item: Maronna, R.A., Martin D. and Yohai V.J. (2006), Robust Statistics, Theory and Methods, Wiley, New York.

Item.MATLABcode: c=TBeff(0.95,1) % for a fixed shape efficiency we have % c= 5.490249208447494 c=TBeff(0.95,1,1)
